built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search that finds code by meaning, not exact text. Use for exploring unfamiliar codebases and understanding behavior patterns.

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents with line range support. Essential for understanding existing implementations before modifications.

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Propose edits to existing files with precise line targeting. Use for implementing code changes and new functionality.

built_in_tools.name: search_replace
built_in_tools.description: Search and replace operations on files with exact string matching. Use for targeted modifications with extensive context.

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Fast exact regex searches over text files. Use for finding specific patterns, imports, or function calls.

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.description: Execute terminal commands for testing, building, and validation. Essential for running the application and verifying changes.

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.description: List directory contents to understand project structure and locate files.

built_in_tools.name: file_search
built_in_tools.description: Fuzzy file search based on file path patterns. Use when you know part of a filename but not the exact location.
